description: Apple chartered cargo flights to ferry 600 tons of iPhones, or as many as 1.5 million, to the United States from India. Analysts have warned that US prices of iPhones could surge, given Apple's high reliance on imports from China, the main manufacturing hub of the devices, which is subject to Trump's highest tariff rate of 125 percent.
title: Apple Said to Have Airlifted 600 Tons of iPhones From India to 'Beat' Trump Tariffs

description: Google laid off hundreds of employees in its platforms and devices unit. The cuts in the division, which houses the Android platform, Pixel phones and the Chrome browser among other applications, follow Google's January buyout offers to employees in the unit.
title: Google Reportedly Lays Off Hundreds of Employees in Android, Pixel Teams

description: Google Pixel Watch 4 launch could take place later this year, alongside the next-generation Pixel 10 smartphones. A new design leak has given us some hints about what to expect from the new Google wearable. The alleged renders show the complete design of the Pixel Watch 4 with a round, familiar design.
title: Google Pixel Watch 4 Leaked Renders Hint at Few Design Changes; Tipped to Offer Wireless Charging Support

description: Adobe shared a sneak peek of several under-development artificial intelligence (AI) agents across its platforms on Wednesday. The San Jose-based software giant is currently looking at how agentic tools can complete manual tasks to free up users to focus on creativity and productivity-based tasks. Adobe is building several AI agents for Photoshop, Premiere Pro, Acrobat, Adobe Express, and even Creative Cloud.
title: Adobe Previews Agentic AI Tools Across Acrobat, Photoshop and Premiere Pro

description: Samsung is believed to unveil its Galaxy Z Flip 7 later this year at a Galaxy Unpacked event. While details about the clamshell foldable phone haven't been officially confirmed, new rumours about its specifications have surfaced up on the Web. According to a new report, Samsung could use its in-house Exynos 2500 chipset in its upcoming foldable phone.
title: Samsung’s Galaxy Z Flip 7 to Skip Snapdragon Chipset in Favour of Exynos 2500: Report

description: In a major policy shift, President Trump has signed an executive order revoking the “DeFi Broker Rule,” a regulation introduced during the final months of former President Joe Biden’s term. Originally slated to take effect in 2026, the rule aimed to curb tax evasion by increasing oversight of cryptocurrency transactions.
title: Trump Reverses  ‘DeFi Broker Rule’ Introduced Under Biden: All Details

description: Google on Thursday rolled out the April 2025 update for Pixel devices. It arrives as an over-the-air (OTA) update for the company's latest Pixel 9 series, Pixel Tablet, and other older devices running Android 15. Google says it brings fixes for issues related to the biometric authentication, camera, and user interface. Further, the April 2025 update also includes a security patch which fixes three vulnerabilities in the software whose severity ranges from high to critical.
title: Google Pixel Phones Receiving April 2025 Update With Bug Fixes, Latest Security Patch

description: Google showcased its XR glasses prototype at TED 2025 in Vancouver, that can be connected to a smartphone for tasks like real-time translation and scenario analysis with a 'Memory' feature. While Apple and Samsung have already announced mixed reality headsets, firms like Meta, Google, and Snapchat are currently developing lightweight XR glasses resembling spectacles.
title: Google XR Glasses Prototype With Real Time Translation, 'Memory' Features Showcased at TED 2025

description: OpenAI announced an update to the Memory feature in ChatGPT on Thursday. The San Francisco-based artificial intelligence (AI) firm is now improving the memory function so that it can not only remember certain information about users’ preferences and interests but can also remember and reference past conversations. The company said the new feature will enable the chatbot to have a more natural conversation with users, and will appear more like a companion.
title: OpenAI Upgrades Memory in ChatGPT, Can Reference to Users’ Previous Chats

description: Samsung Galaxy M56 5G will be unveiled in India soon as a successor to the Galaxy M55 5G, which was introduced in the country in April 2024. Samsung has now confirmed the launch date. The company also teased the design and revealed several key features of the upcoming smartphone, which is claimed to be 30 percent slimmer than the preceding handset.
title: Samsung Galaxy M56 5G India Launch Set for April 17; Design, Key Features Revealed

description: Elon Musk’s xAI, the artificial intelligence (AI) firm behind the Grok chatbot, released a new application programming interface (API) on Thursday. The new API is for the Grok 3 AI model, which the company introduced in February. So far, the AI model has been available to the end consumer via the X (formerly known as Twitter) platform, the dedicated website, or the mobile apps.
title: Elon Musk’s xAI Releases Grok 3 in API for Developers, Introduces a ‘Fast’ Model

description: iQOO’s Z10x seems like a worthy upgrade to the iQOO Z9x, that we have been waiting for. The iQOO Z9x was a fine contender but fell short in many areas. Its design was very basic. Its raw performance and cameras were not up to the mark as well. Does the iQOO Z10x aim to resolve these shortcomings? Let’s find out!
title: iQOO Z10x First Impressions

description: JioHotstar has increased its paying subscriber base to over 200 million, driven by multi-language live broadcasts of the hugely popular Indian Premier League cricket matches. To get so many paying subscribers just from India in such a short time was “pretty satisfying,” said Uday Shankar, vice chairman of JioStar.
title: JioHotstar Crosses 200 Million Paying Subscribers on IPL Frenzy

description: Whether it is Marathas taking over Mughals in the battle or Sakshi exploring mysterious truths about her missing daughter, OTT has it all for you this weekend.
title: OTT Releases This Week (April 11 - April 14): Chhaava, The Last of US Season 2, Chorii 2, and More

description: Poco F7 Ultra will likely be available in India soon. A senior company executive has teased the arrival of the Ultra variant in the country. The Indian variant is expected to share similarities with its global counterpart. The Poco F7 Ultra was unveiled in select global markets in March alongside the Poco F7 Pro. The Ultra comes with a Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC, a 5,300mAh battery with 120W wired and 50W wireless charging support, and a 6.67-inch 120Hz WQHD+ AMOLED display.
title: Poco F7 Ultra India Launch Officially Teased; May Arrive Alongside Poco F7

description: Gaming company Razer announced the official launch of the Razer PC Remote Play platform on Thursday. First announced at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2025 in beta, the platform allows streaming of PC games to mobile devices such as phones and tablets, along with Windows-based handhelds. The company says it takes advantage of the full frame rate and resolution of the mobile device to deliver high-fidelity visuals without issues such as letterboxing or pillarboxing.
title: Razer PC Remote Play for Streaming Games to Mobile Devices and Windows-Based Handhelds Launched

description: Nintendo and Sony Group are likely to raise prices on their game consoles in response to US tariffs. American consumers would pay as as much as 30% more for a Switch 2 or PlayStation 5 under the base-case scenario, which would imply pricing close to $590 (roughly Rs. 50,765) for the soon-to-be-released Nintendo flagship machine or Sony’s PS5 Astro Bot bundle.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 and Sony PS5 Likely to Get Price Hikes Due to Tariffs

description: Oppo Enco Free 4 has been launched in China, and the new wireless headset features a coaxial dual driver setup with a 11mm woofer and a 6mm tweeter. It offers up to 11 hours of playback without ANC, and 5.5 hours with ANC enabled. The TWS headset features IP55 dust and water resistance, according to the company.
title: Oppo Enco Free 4 With Dynaudio Tuning, IP55 Rating Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Motorola has announced the launch date of its Moto Book 60 laptop in India. The Lenovo-owned brand will make its debut in the laptop market with the new device. The company will also unveil the Moto Pad 60 Pro tablet alongside its new laptop. Both devices are confirmed to go on sale through Flipkart in the country. The e-commerce website is teasing the arrival of the new Motorola devices.
title: Moto Book 60 Laptop Set to Launch on April 17 in India, Moto Pad 60 Pro to Tag Along

description: Redmi A5 was recently unveiled in Indonesia with an octa-core Unisoc T7250 chipset and a 5,200mAh battery. The handset is now set to arrive in the Indian market. Alongside announcing the India launch date of the smartphone, the company has revealed its design, colour options and a few key features. The availability details of the phone are confirmed as well.
title: Redmi A5 India Launch Set for April 15; Colour Options, Key Features Revealed

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 specifications have surfaced online, giving us a look at the upcoming book-style foldable that is expected to launch with Android 16 and One UI 8. The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 is expected to feature a custom Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chip, similar to the Galaxy S25 series, and the device is expected to bring notable upgrades in the display and camera departments.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Specifications Leak; Tipped to Arrive With Larger Displays, One UI 8

description: Xiaomi on Wednesday announced the commencement of its Android 16 Developer Preview Programme starting with two handsets. This means developers with Xiaomi 15 and the Xiaomi 14T Pro can enroll in the programme to get an early access to the Chinese OEM’s Android 15 succeeding OS and test out all the new features. The programme requires users to download and install the Android 16 Beta build by either using local install or fastboot update methods.
title: Xiaomi Announces Android 16 Developer Preview Programme for Xiaomi 15 and Xiaomi 14T Pro

description: YouTube is adding a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature for the creators on its platform. Announced on Tuesday, the new tool is an AI-powered music generator that will enable content creators to generate custom instrumentals for their videos. The new feature is part of the Creator Music tab within YouTube Studio and will be available to creators at no cost.
title: YouTube Is Upgrading Creator Music With AI-Powered Music Generation Feature

description: The overall valuation of the crypto market dropped marginally by 0.85 percent over the last day. Bitcoin and Ether, both registered losses on the price charts on Friday, April 11. Tether, Ripple, Tron, and Cardano – all registered losses on Friday. Dogecoin, Cronos, and Zcash meanwhile, reflected small profits amid ongoing market volatility.
title: Crypto Price Today: Bitcoin Climbs Back Above $80,000; Altcoins Remain Stable as Market Volatility Persists

description: Google released its second artificial intelligence (AI) model in the Gemini 2.5 family on Thursday. Dubbed Gemini 2.5 Flash, it is a cost-efficient low-latency model which is designed for tasks requiring real-time inference, conversations at scale, and those which are generalistic in nature. The tech giant will soon make the AI model available on both the Google AI Studio as well as Vertex AI.
title: Google Releases Cost-Efficient and Low-Latency Gemini 2.5 Flash AI Model

description: iQOO Z10 and iQOO Z10x were launched in India on Friday. The latest Z series smartphones by the Vivo sub-brand come in two colour options. The iQOO Z10 runs on a Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 chip, while the iQOO Z10x has a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 SoC. The vanilla model houses a 7,300mAh battery with 90W fast charging support, while the iQOO Z10x boasts a 6,500mAh battery.
title: iQOO Z10 With 7,300mAh Battery Launched in India Alongside iQOO Z10x: Price, Specifications

description: Motorola has announced that it will launch two new smartphones, including a clamshell foldable, later this month. These are expected to be the Motorola Edge 60 Pro and Razr 60 Ultra. The company has yet to confirm the monikers or any of their details. Meanwhile, recent leaks and reports have suggested several key features including chipset and display specifications, and expected prices of the purported smartphones.
title: Motorola Schedules Launch Event for April 24; Likely to Unveil Edge 60 Pro, Razr 60 Ultra

description: Naughty Dog is back with another The Last of Us announcement. It’s not a new game, but the Sony-owned studio announced a new edition that bundles the two games in the series in a single package. The Last of Us Complete brings together The Last of Us Part 1 and The Last of Us Part 2 Remastered on PS5.
title: Naughty Dog Releases The Last of Us Part 1 and Part 2 Remastered in New 'Complete' Edition on PS5

description: Threads is said to be testing a new feature which aims to make it easier to import the social graph from other microblogging platforms. According to a tipster, it is currently in beta and not available to all users. The feature is expected to introduce a way through which users can easily follow the same accounts on Threads as they do on X (formerly Twitter) without having to manually search for and follow the creator.
title: Threads Reportedly Testing New Feature for Importing Social Graph, Finding Creators Followed on X

description: MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ chip was launched by the Taiwan-based chipmaker, featuring an All Big Core design with a faster Arm Cortex-X925 core than its predecessor. The MediaTek NPU 890 is claimed to deliver a 20 percent boost in AI performance with Speculative Decoding+ (SpD+). Here's everything you need to know about the MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC.
title: MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ With Slightly Improved CPU and NPU Performance Launched

description: Oppo Pad 4 Pro was officially launched in China on Thursday with Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. The new Android tablet comes in three colour options with a 13.2-inch LCD display with 3.4K resolution and up to 144Hz refresh rate. The Oppo Pad 4 Pro has a 12,140mAh battery with 67W fast charging support. It has a single 13-megapixel camera at the rear.
title: Oppo Pad 4 Pro With Snapdragon 8 Elite Chipset, 12,140mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Oppo Watch X2 Mini was launched in China on Thursday alongside the Oppo Find X8 Ultra and the Find X8s series. The smartwatch is powered by a Snapdragon W5 Gen 1 SoC alongside a BES2700BP chipset. It has a 345mAh battery which is claimed to last for up to seven days on a single charge. The smart wearable supports eSIM connectivity and is available in an option with gold-plated accents.
title: Oppo Watch X2 Mini With 1.32-Inch AMOLED Display, Snapdragon W5 Gen 1 Chipset Launched

description: Oppo Find X8s series was launched in China on Thursday comprising two models — Oppo Find X8s and Find X8s+. The handsets offer 120Hz AMOLED screens in different size options. They are powered by the 3nm MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ chipset with up to 16GB of LPDDR5X RAM. The Oppo Find X8s series gets a 50-megapixel Hasselblad-tuned triple rear camera unit. Both models support 80W SuperVOOC wired fast charging and 50W wireless charging.
title: Oppo Find X8s, Find X8s+ With Dimensity 9400+ Chipset and Hasselblad Tuned Cameras Launched

description: WhatsApp on Wednesday announced several new features for Android and iOS users which bring more functionality to chats, voice calls, video calls, and Channels. As per Meta’s instant messaging platform, there is now an “Online” indicator in group chats which lets users know about others who are available for a conversation in real time. Then there are tappable reactions which makes it easier to view everyone’s message reactions and simply tap to follow up with the same.
title: WhatsApp Rolls Out Tappable Reactions, Video Notes for Channels and Other Features for Android, iOS
